result.eng: It was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ga: ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.orig: ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.html: ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ponchtml: ba léir go raiḃ tú idir ḋá ċoṁairle maidir leis an ḟreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.

result.eng: It was obvious that they had broken the law.
result.ga: ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlí
result.orig: ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlí
result.html: ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlíIt was obvious that they had broken the law.
result.ponchtml: ba léir gur ẛáraiġ siad an dlíIt was obvious that they had broken the law.

result.eng: It was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ga: bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.orig: bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.html: bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadhIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé soiléir óna dreaċ go raiḃ sí tar éis a ḃeiṫ ag caoineaḋIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
